name: Something is Afoot in a Lab in Omaha, Nebraska
name_original: Something is Afoot in a Lab in Omaha, Nebraska
description: You are Test Subject 37, a top secret experiment in a government lab in Omaha, Nebraska. You have finally managed to break out, and desperately want to find your way out of the facility. Use the arrow keys or WASD to shrink and grow your rubbery slime body to avoid danger and navigate randomly generated obstacles!
